title: 9 Dead In S.C. Church Shooting; Suspect Hunted By Authorities
teaser: A man described as white, about 21 years old with sandy blonde hair, walked into a historic black church in Charleston, S.C., and opened fire Wednesday night. A total of nine people are dead. The mayor says he believes it was a hate crime.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
